short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: anonyChat is a chrome extension chat engine built to share vital text information between two or more individuals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: anonyChat is a chat engine built to share vital text information between two or more individuals. chat messages gets deleted after 5 hours of creation.
